name: Crime Vegas - Extreme Crime Third Person Shooter
name_original: Crime Vegas - Extreme Crime Third Person Shooter
description:
Crime Vegas is the 3d game which is all about the madness of the gangsters in the city and your job is to kill the gangsters.

You are the new hero of the city and your task is to eliminate all the robbers and gangsters from the city and spread the fear in the gangsters and save the innocent peoples from them.

This game is really easy to play and it has really cool gameplay and graphics
You does not need to have any network connection to play this game
It has really amazing 3D graphics

So what you are waiting for. Just download this game eliminate the enemies
